Create Altair chart from vegaspec

Source: R/alt.R
as_chart.Rd

Create Altair chart from vegaspec

as_chart(spec)

Arguments

spec

vegaspec

Value

altair object

Examples

  as_chart(vegawidget::spec_mtcars)
